comments.dependencies-info: Those are the purpose of the dependencies listed bellow:
comments.1: @fortawesome libraries -> For some icons and fonts used in the UI.
comments.2: react-bootstrap, react-toastify, bootstrap, react, next -> For providing UI elements and funcionality.
comments.3: react-world-flags, react-chartjs-2, recharts, react-stars -> For graphic elements used in the UI, like the flags,
comments.3b: the charts used in the admin panel, and the stars of the recipe ratings.
comments.4: moment, date-fns -> For dates formatting and transformation.
comments.5: cookies-next, jsonwebtoken -> To manage, read and save browser cookies, and jwt for the user sessions.
comments.6: i18next -> To manage languages and translations available in the application.
comments.7: axios, dotenv -> To make some request to the backend, and support to .env file of enviromn. variables.
comments.end: more detailed info on the project documentation (docs folder)
